name: Honeywell CL30XC 63 Pint 4-Speed Indoor Portable Evaporative Air Cooler
categoryPath: Home Improvement/Heating, Cooling, & Air Quality/Air Conditioners

reviews.name: Honeywell CL30XC 63 Pt Indoor Portable Evaporative Air Cooler with Remote Control, Gray
reviews.reviewText: I live in Los Angeles and this air cooler does a good job. My apartment stays under 80 degree. (before I got the air coller 90 to 110 degrees on hot days)
reviews.title: Brings fresh air..

reviews.name: Honeywell CL30XC 63 Pt Indoor Portable Evaporative Air Cooler with Remote Control, Gray
reviews.reviewText: You can make the Cooler put as much or as little air as you need. Nice looking and does not take up a lot of space. Easy to use.
reviews.title: Puts out lots of air.

reviews.name: Honeywell CL30XC 63 Pt Indoor Portable Evaporative Air Cooler with Remote Control, Gray
reviews.reviewText: When I got the cooler, it was used with hair and dust all over it. And it didn't even work. So I returned it. Never even bother getting an other one.
reviews.title: used

reviews.name: Honeywell CL30XC 63 Pt Indoor Portable Evaporative Air Cooler with Remote Control, Gray
reviews.reviewText: it works ok in weather below 95, but struggles to cool a med size after that.
reviews.title: az heat
